{"step_by_step_thinking": "The highest concentration of oxygen is delivered through the device that can provide the most oxygen to the patient. A nasal cannula delivers a lower concentration of oxygen, typically up to 40%. A Venturi mask can deliver up to 50% oxygen. A bag and mask can deliver up to 100% oxygen, but it requires the patient to breathe on their own. A mask with reservoir can deliver up to 100% oxygen and does not require the patient to breathe on their own.", "answer_choice": "D. Mask with reservoir"}
